text: is a Japanese politician. He was the Minister of Defense from August 2022 to September 2024. He was in this role before from 2008 to 2009. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He is also in the House of Representatives since 1993. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Politicians from Chiba Prefecture Category:Defense ministers of Japan
title: Yasukazu Hamada
